snippet: Monika Grzymala, who was born in Poland and has lived most of her life in Germany, is a kind of wizard at conjuring installation pieces out of different kinds of tape.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews Monika Grzymala exhibit Volumen at Morgan Library & Museum.
lead_paragraph: Monika Grzymala, who was born in Poland and has lived most of her life in Germany, is a kind of wizard at conjuring installation pieces out of different kinds of tape.
